item.title: About
item.description: I’m a Norwegian Software Engineer, weight lifter, hobby psychologist, metal head and I love to automate things. For the last few years I’ve been helping Tech companies implement DevOps best practices. At home I’m a husband, a dad and I build things for fun and not so much profit. For this blog I’ll be keeping things short and to the point. There will be no ads, because who has time for that anyway.
